org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.orm.jpa

类 JpaBaseConfiguration.JpaWebConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.orm.jpa.JpaBaseConfiguration.JpaWebConfiguration
  • 封闭类:
    JpaBaseConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=SERVLET)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer.class)
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value={<error>,<error>})
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.jpa",
                       name="open-in-view",
                       havingValue="true",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
protected static class JpaBaseConfiguration.JpaWebConfiguration
extends Object
